title: Dynamic Blog App
description: Blogger is a dynamic blog web application that I developed to provide users with a seamless and feature-packed blogging experience. It's a platform where creators can express themselves and readers can engage with their content. My responsibilities for this project included:
functions: Designed user-friendly account management, including sign-up, login, logout.
Developed a responsive interface for blog creation, updates, and deletions, with support for dark and light modes.
Implemented interactive features: comments, likes/dislikes, views, user verification, and follow/unfollow functionality.
Integrated dynamic pagination for efficient navigation.
Built a secure backend with Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB.
techStack: React | Redux Toolkit | Chakra UI | CSS | Node.js | Express.js | MongoDB
